about.name: Min-Chieh (MinJ) Hsiao
about.description: Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the software industry. Skilled in Web development, JavaScript, Typescript, and Angular.

e0.title: Staff Member Of Technical Staff at VMware
e0.description: Joined as a full-stack developer in 2013. Later focused on UI development and was lead of some key features in vRealize Automation from early design phase.

e1.title: Software Engineer at Adconion
e1.description: Worked on several tech stacks to create business applications for data management.

langExt.title: Search with Language Range
langExt.description: A Chrome extension to search in Google with the lanaguage you choose.

lineBot.title: Line Bot Notification
lineBot.description: The chat bot is developed in Line Messenger, and it will be triggered by a Chrome extension, which is checking if a target element in the current page reaches the expected state.
lineBot.summary: A chat bot in Line Messenger to notify if a target element is triggered on a website.

gameDemo.title: A Turn-based Battle Game
gameDemo.description: This demo shows a turn-based battle game using game engine OGRE.
gameDemo.summary: A turn-based battle game by using C++ and OGRE.

antDemo.title: Simulation of Ant's Behavior
antDemo.description: One interesting animal behavior is ant's use of pheromones as a joint communication mechanism. In this project, a simulation of how ants interact with each other is implemented.
antDemo.summary: Implement ant's use of pheromones to simulate animal behavior, using C++ and OGRE
